weekly_top_story.headline: CMS Launches ACCESS Model to Expand Tech-Enabled Chronic Care for Medicare Beneficiaries
weekly_top_story.summary: The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services launched the ACCESS Model, a voluntary 10-year initiative starting Dec. 1, 2025, aimed at testing outcome-based payments that enhance technology-supported care for common chronic conditions, promising greater clinician flexibility and improved patient outcomes.

stories.headline: Senate Set to Vote on Extension of ACA Enhanced Premium Tax Credits Amid Looming Expiration
stories.summary: The Senate plans a vote next week on a clean 3-year extension of the enhanced Affordable Care Act premium subsidies set to expire at year-end, crucial to preventing premium spikes and coverage losses for millions.

stories.headline: HHS Releases Comprehensive Artificial Intelligence Strategy to Advance Healthcare Innovation
stories.summary: The Department of Health and Human Services unveiled its AI strategy aimed at leveraging artificial intelligence to improve healthcare efficiency, innovation, and patient outcomes nationwide.
